title: Cozy 1st Floor One Bed/One Bath (Ready Now)
neighborhood: 643 Dorchester Drive, Suite 225 Rochester Hills, MI
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Nestled in idyllic Rochester Hills, Oaks at Hampton beckons with a glimpse of apartment living as you’ve never imagined.
Feel at ease with our highly rated Rochester schools nearby and Troy’s vibrant business and technology corridor five miles away.
Our place in the prestigious Hampton Planned Community offers all the best of Rochester Hills, right at your front door.
Upgraded kitchen cabinets, new wood-style flooring and silver appliances twinkle with a fresh, eye-catching sheen.
A lap pool stretches into the distance as a golf ball, hit just right, soars into the air at the Hampton Golf Course down the street.
Settle into Oaks at Hampton Apartments, and experience apartment living the way it should be.
Our one bedroom, one bathroom lower leveled apartment, has its own private entry.
Our lower unit also comes with a private patio, each apartment also has in unit, stack-able washer and dryer.
The bedroom has a spacious walk in closet and a creative room right off the kitchen!
This room can be used for an office, dog room or even storage!
Our kitchens comes with a stove/oven combination, refrigerator, dishwasher and let's not forget about the garbage disposal!
DEPOSIT & FEES:$300 non-refundable fee(plus an additional $100 fee for puppies under 1 year of age) --PET RENT:$40/month per pet(per pet, 2 max allowed)
Hardwood floor, Tile floor, Fireplace, Vaulted ceiling, Non-Smoking Property
